Whoops, sorry about the mistake, Alten.


::Lavacons::

Lavatron yells, bringing up an arm to protect his face. Lightning 
strikes the arm. Astral gives a mental order and Lavatron splits up 
into the seperate five bots again.

"Lavacons, you know what to do!" Astrall yells. The skies overhead 
begin to get dark. (I'm trying to match how Dcoburn originally 
transformed the Lavacons into Dark Lavacons)

Lighting rained down, mixing in with the lightning fired by Shadow 
Cat. After a dark flash, the Lavacons stand up. They were now the 
Light Lavacons (not light as in good, light as in lightning). Energy 
jumped from the fingertips of the various members of the team, 
although that high energy level didn't last too long before returning 
to normal.

"LAVACONS, UNITE!"

The Lavacons all jump in the air, forming various bodyparts again. 
Light Lavatron stretches to his full height. Clapping his hands 
together, the gestalt sends electricity streaming toward Shadow Cat.


(Reading the Lavacons' profile might help explain the transformations)
